resources.string:
Apali Bhas is a community-driven app dedicated to preserving and promoting the rich tapestry of Konkani dialects spoken across Goa and the Konkan coast.

Our mission is to empower users to detect, understand, and celebrate the linguistic diversity of Konkani — from village idioms to coastal expressions.

This app is built with love, technology, and a deep respect for our mother tongue. Let’s keep our language alive — one word at a time.

Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our app.

We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.

We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
